backend/main.mo: Actor combines access control, user approval, and profile storage with functions for approval management and user profile CRUD.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color variables and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component routing between login, admin panel, and user dashboard using session state and theming.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Action: Reusable action tile component with gradient backgrounds and size variants for admin/user/mobile layouts.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/dashbo: Exports shared Tailwind class constants for consistent border, padding, and radius styling across dashboard components.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Confirm: Reusable confirmation dialog using alert-dialog UI components with customizable text and variants.
Toast wrapper providing standardized success, error, and info notifications.
App shell layout with gradient header, logout confirmation dialog, and footer wrapper around child views.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomShe: Provides a bottom sheet overlay with backdrop, scroll lock, close button, and animated slide‑up content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Dashboard: Renders a footer with optional settings button and a support/chat button styled with gradients and icons.
Wraps content inside a centered mobile-style dashboard frame with fixed dimensions and background styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/PopupModa: Implements a full-screen modal with backdrop, scroll locking, a top-right close button, and scrollable content.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Controls the admin panel’s active view, header, footer, logout flow, and renders various admin sections based on navigation state.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Displays a fixed bottom navigation bar for admin views with icons and active-state styling.
Shows a 3‑row grid of ActionTiles for navigating between admin sections, using dynamic labels and themed gradients.
Provides a reusable page layout for admin sections with fixed header, optional back button, scrollable content, and footer.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/a: Defines AdminView union type and navigation item metadata for admin panel routes.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Loads account data from storage and displays income, expense, and due totals using styled KPI cards.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/App: Displays pending user approval requests and lets admins approve them by updating local storage and worker data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Com: Allows adding company financial reports and lists taken and due reports sorted by timestamp.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Fin: Shows each worker’s total bill, cost, and final balance from stored account data.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Nas: Manages snack cost entries split among selected workers, updates account costs, and supports deleting entries.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pay: Handles loan/payment entries shared among workers, updates account costs, and allows deleting previous entries.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Pro: Records production work with quantity and rate, updates worker bills, and supports deleting entries.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Set: Wrapper that renders the system settings section.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Sys: Provides tabbed admin settings including branding, labels, notices, and sections, with logo upload and branding persistence.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Use: Wraps ApprovalsSection to display user approval requests.
frontend/src/features/admin/sections/Wor: Allows adding, editing, and deleting workers and their single/double rates, persisting data in storage.
Manages work entries, worker selection, rate-based amount calculation, history storage, and deletion with account updates.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Implements login form with branding display, validation, and session login handling, with toggle to registration.
Handles new user registration requests with duplicate checks and saves pending requests before redirecting to login.
frontend/src/features/support/SupportVie: Renders user/admin support messaging, loading threads, displaying messages, and sending new messages.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Cl: Displays a live-updating digital clock with formatted time and date.
frontend/src/features/user/components/Us: Shows KPI cards for user totals including due, work, and taken amounts.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Nasta: Loads and displays the user's nasta history, calculating per-entry amounts and totals.
frontend/src/features/user/payment/Payme: Displays the user’s loan/payment history with per-entry calculations and total amount.
frontend/src/features/user/production/Pr: Shows production history entries for the user and aggregates total body and payment.
frontend/src/features/user/production/wo: Utility to format worker names from entry data, returning a list or fallback label.
frontend/src/features/user/profile/Profi: Provides a profile settings UI allowing users to update photo, mobile number, and password with validation and session updates.
frontend/src/features/user/UserDashboard: Main user dashboard managing navigation between views, loading user data, and showing KPIs and actions.
frontend/src/features/user/work/WorkHist: Loads and displays a user's filtered work history with calculated earnings and a total summary.
frontend/src/features/work/workAmount.ts: Computes per-user and group payment amounts using entry details or fallback rate data from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Manages branding settings from storage and listens for update events to refresh state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardOverrides: Loads dashboard override labels from storage and updates state when override events fire.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Implements simple hash-based routing with state sync and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, session management, and status tracking through a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserNotice.ts: Loads notice configuration and updates state when notice-related events are dispatched.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, gradients, utilities, and animations for the app's styling.
frontend/src/lib/branding/brandingStorag: Handles branding settings persistence in localStorage and dispatches update events, with helpers for logo URLs.
frontend/src/lib/storage/companyReportSt: Manages company report entries in localStorage, allowing add, retrieve, filter, and delete operations.
frontend/src/lib/storage/dashboardOverri: Handles saving, loading, and resetting customizable dashboard label overrides in localStorage with update events.
frontend/src/lib/storage/noticeStorage.t: Stores and retrieves user dashboard scrolling notice settings in localStorage and dispatches updates.
frontend/src/lib/storage/safeStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers for localStorage access, including array normalization and validation helpers.
frontend/src/lib/storage/storageSchema.t: Ensures storage schema versioning by clearing legacy keys and marking the current version.
frontend/src/lib/storage/supportMessagin: Maintains support message threads in localStorage, enabling message retrieval and thread updates.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userIdStorage.t: Assigns and manages stable numeric user IDs for approved users and retrieves user IDs by name or mobile.
frontend/src/lib/storage/userProfileStor: Stores, retrieves, and removes user profile photos in localStorage using a prefixed key.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/state/session/SessionProvid: Provides session management including initialization, login handling, schema setup, and user ID assignment.
Defines TypeScript interfaces for session state, login results, user profiles, and approval data.
frontend/src/state/session/useSession.ts: Custom hook to access session context, ensuring it runs within the provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and managing URL and session parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling dark mode and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the UI fix request state, listing existing features, pending requests, and issues related to user dashboard layout, header styling, and registration form theming.
